text: Alexis Vastine (17 November 1986 â€“ 9 March 2015) was a French boxer. He won a bronze medal at the 2008 Summer Olympics in the Light Welterweight division. He also competed in the 2012 Summer Olympics. He died in the Villa Castelli helicopter crash during the filming of French TV reality show Dropped for the TF1 network. ==References== ==Other websites== * 2004 results Category:1986 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French boxers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:People from Eure Category:Aviation deaths Category:Sportspeople from Normandy
title: Alexis Vastine
